description: This header file declares the interface for the System Repository Record Object in the BroadWay Runtime System. It provides function prototypes for creating, removing, enrolling, and initializing repository record objects.

methods.name: SysCreateRepositoryRecord
methods.description: Creates a repository record object within a container context.

methods.name: SysRroCreate
methods.description: Constructs a new instance of the repository record object.

methods.name: SysRroRemove
methods.description: Removes or deletes the repository record object.

methods.name: SysRroEnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls necessary sub-objects or components for the repository record.
